jobs.title: CSSI Intern
jobs.description: - Selected as one of 30 students chosen to participate in Google’s highly selective summer program at the NYC headquarters to build and deploy a socially-oriented startup webapp using Google App Engine, while developing our skills in Python, JS, HTML/CSS and SQL

jobs.title: Clerical Intern
jobs.description: -Assisted in various capacities in the human resources department performing tasks ranging from file management to working as an assistant to department leadership. - Ensured the success of two new employee orientations by single-handedly creating over 250 employee orientation folders as done through printing, sorting, assembling, and labelling. I served as the informational assistant at the orientations’ sign-in and information desk

jobs.title: Co-op Intern
jobs.description: - Observed and studied the daily practices of periodontists as they performed various dental operations ranging from implants to root canals. - assisted in medical procedures by using medical-grade sterile techniques to handle and provide surgical equipment for periodontists.

awards.name: Lazaridis School of Business and Economics 1st Year HP Case Competition Finalist
awards.description: 5th Place Finalist out of 48 semi-finalist teams in the Hewlett Packard Consulting Case Competition

activities.title: Business Develpment Executive
activities.description: - I am a business development executive of the Laurier Chapter at SOS, a student-run business that offers university crash courses with the social mission of donating the proceeds to fund educational development in South America. - I work to bring in new business opportunities for financial growth through sponsorships, partnerships, and fundraising etc.

activities.title: Hack the Valley IV
activities.description: - Built a React webapp designed to bring short term housing and subletting listings from the web into one place using Python web-scraping.
